summary: This bill, the Deschutes River Conservancy Reauthorization Act of 2025, aims to amend the Oregon Resource Conservation Act of 1996. It reauthorizes the Deschutes River Conservancy Working Group and updates its composition. The bill specifies the representation on the board, including representatives from environmental groups, agriculture, Native American tribes, hydroelectric production, federal agencies, the State of Oregon, and local government. It also extends the reauthorization period to 2032 and increases the allowable administrative cost percentage.
